SQL.LOAD: SELECT PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID, DEALER_ID, ADJUSTMENT_BY, ADJUSTMENT_BASED_ON, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, ADJUSTMENT_PERCENTAGE, ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY FROM ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING WHERE PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID = :premium_adjustment_setting_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT PAS.PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID, PAS.ADJUSTMENT_BY, PAS.EFFECTIVE_DATE, D.DEALER DEALER_CODE FROM ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING PAS, ELP_DEALER D, elp_company C WHERE --dynamic_in_clause and PAS.DEALER_ID = D.DEALER_ID(+) and D.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_order_by_clause
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING ( PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID, DEALER_ID, ADJUSTMENT_BY, ADJUSTMENT_BASED_ON, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, ADJUSTMENT_PERCENTAGE, ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT ) VALUES ( :PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID, :DEALER_ID, :ADJUSTMENT_BY, :ADJUSTMENT_BASED_ON, :EFFECTIVE_DATE, :EXPIRATION_DATE, :ADJUSTMENT_PERCENTAGE, :ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT )
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING SET PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID = :PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID, DEALER_ID = :DEALER_ID, ADJUSTMENT_BY = :ADJUSTMENT_BY, ADJUSTMENT_BASED_ON = :ADJUSTMENT_BASED_ON, EFFECTIVE_DATE = :EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE = :EXPIRATION_DATE, ADJUSTMENT_PERCENTAGE = :ADJUSTMENT_PERCENTAGE, ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT = :ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT WHERE PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID = :PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_SETTING_ID
